long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Raft Wars is an exciting and engaging game available as a Chrome extension. Join Simon and his brother on a thrilling adventure as they defend their treasure against intruders. Armed with tennis balls and a trusty raft, you'll engage in epic battles on land and water. Strategically aim and shoot tennis balls at enemies, knocking them off their rafts and thwarting their attempts to steal your treasure. 
As you progress, the challenges become more difficult, requiring precise aim and clever tactics. Earn coins to upgrade your weapons and unlock powerful projectiles. With its colorful graphics, humorous storyline, and addictive gameplay, Raft Wars offers hours of fun and entertainment. Can you protect your treasure and emerge victorious? Dive into this Chrome Extension game, join the battle, and show your skills in this epic adventure on the high seas.
